title: Room Scanner
description:
Introducing Room Scanner! Transform your space with our advanced LiDAR technology. Create precise 2D and 3D models of any room, perfect for renovations, redesigns, or real estate. Scan rooms in seconds, generate detailed floor plans, and export in various formats for easy sharing. Ideal for homeowners, designers, and professionals. Try Room Scanner today and see your space in a whole new light! 
Export your scans and work with it in your favourite 3D application.
